entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Snow level 500 metres lowering to valley bottom before morning. Wind south 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 6:14 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to snow late in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 4 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 6:14 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 6:14 PM PST Monday 20 February 2023
